Package htsjdk.samtools.fastq

Interface Summary
FastqWriter Simple interface for a class that can write out fastq records.
 

Class Summary
AsyncFastqWriter Implementation of a FastqWriter that provides asynchronous output.
BasicFastqWriter In general FastqWriterFactory should be used so that AsyncFastqWriter can be enabled, but there are some cases in which that behavior is explicitly not wanted.
FastqConstants  
FastqReader Reads a FASTQ file with four lines per record.
FastqRecord Represents a fastq record, fairly literally, i.e.
FastqWriterFactory Factory class for creating FastqWriter objects.
